name: SNAK3D
description:
The classic game of SNAKE meets the third dimension in SNAK3D

It's time to put that old cell phone away. Control the snake with the tilt of your hand to navigate the labyrinth you build as you continue to move forward. Collect as many yellow cubes as possible in order to grow, but be sure not to crash into any blocks or walls, or your slithering will be over.

Become one with the snake in first person mode, or watch it from above with the third person camera setting.

Either download the game for Windows, OS X, or Android, or play SNAK3D directly in browser!

Note: SNAK3D also supports keyboard input for those without a Leap Motion Controller.


For more, visit our website.
